page.title: 03Games Children Play
page.content: Games Children Play {Cannon}is a game for four or more people.You need three sticks 40cm long and one 30cm long.Lean the three long sticks up against a wall and place the short stick across the top.Divide players equally into two teams.One side throws a ball and tries to knock down the sticks.If they do they run away and the other side gets the ball.They can hide it in their clothes and if they hit one of the other side with the ball that person is out.But if the bowling team can replace the sticks before anyone is hit they have won a point.If the ball bounces off the wall and is caught by the other side the bowler is out.
